text: I have so much fun with you guys you
guys are wonderful people I this dream
come true to get to come do comedy for
people like you guys it's going well and
I'm thankful that this this dream is
working out then better than my previous
dream all throughout my whole life my
dream was to play in the NBA and that
wasn't a joke that was for real I'm
pouring my heart out to you people I
know why you're laughing so let's just
talk about it there's not a lot of 5
foot 5 guys like me and professional
basketball here's the you know everybody
wants to make fun of the short guy until
your kids won't come down from the play
place then where everybody's best friend
[Music]
Oh little Gavin won't come down will he
mm-hmm the same Gavin you were offering
me his old clothes a second ago okay
I'll go get Gavin here's the worst part
about being short I'll just tell you so
like if you know any short people you'll
just be able to look at them next time
when you see them out in the wild and
you can be like I get you one of your
kind told me about your struggles here's
the worst part about being short
particularly a short man it's getting
hugs from tall women
[Laughter]
I don't know what to do with it

for me it's like hugging my second grade
teacher by for the summer for them it's

they come in frog and then they just
